object.creator: zhong.apex
object.name: vIB_LXLCB
object.package: 100_新三板.挂牌阶段.03-立项流程表

column.name: SM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '

                  声  明  书

' +'

立项小组成员与本次参与表决的项目是否存在以下需要回避表决的情形：(请选择“是”或“否”)

' +'

1、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目的项目组成员（包括该项目其他中介机构项目组成员）；

' +'

2、本人或直系亲属直接或间接持有待表决项目相关公司的股份等权益；

' +'

3、本人或直系亲属担任待表决项目相关公司的董事、监事、高级管理人员，或为待表决项目相关公司的实际控制人；

' +'

4、本人与待表决项目的项目组，归属于公司同一投行业务部门（团队），或待表决项目的项目组属于本人分管的承做部门（团队）；

' +'

5、待表决项目由委员本人或其直系亲属，或其直系亲属担任董事、监事、高级管理人员的单位承揽或协助承揽。

' +'

 

'

column.name: SFHB
column.comment: '<font color=red>如存在声明中的情形，请在是否回避中选择“是”！<font>'

column.name: BJYJ
column.option: 1|同意;3|有条件同意;4|暂缓;2|不同意
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFHB!=1

column.name: BJYJSM
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFHB!=1

column.name: SJLY
column.option: 0|本系统;1|原投行系统;2|协同系统

column.name: XTLCLJ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='http://oa.ebscn.com/workflow/request/ViewRequest.jsp?requestid='+OLDBH; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_NULLSUB(SJLY,'0')!=2||LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: BZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
在底稿系统中完成“项目承揽及立项阶段”底稿上传工作，才能发起立项流程'

column.name: SFDYSJZQ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_LXLCB_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>请确认您首次点击本流程的时间是知晓该项目信息的第一时间！<font>

column.name: ZQSJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFDYSJZQ==0||ABS_SQLVALUE('select count(1) rs from ecif.lcIB_LXLCB_ZQMX where instid=? and zqr=?',[InstID,$Login.User])>=1
column.comment: <font color=red>知情时间不得晚于当天，否则视为无效时间</font>

column.name: DGSCBL
column.describe: 项目承揽及立项阶段上传比例

column.name: FXBSSM
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var i=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT TSNR FROM ECIF.TIB_XMFXBSXX WHERE YXZT = 1"); ''+i+''
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> XMMC.SFFXXM!=1

column.name: BJDBR
column.describe: 签字人(保荐代表人/主办人)
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFSJGKFX !=1

column.name: XMLX
column.option: 0|挂牌;1|再融资(定向发行);2|再融资(公开发行);3|重大资产重组;4|收购业务;5|承接持续督导;6|其他类型

column.name: LXCS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  key = ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) +1 FROM ECIF.lcIB_LXLCB WHERE XMMC = ?",[XMMC]);
key

column.name: LXSPYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 1 && LXSPYJ==null
column.disable-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 1

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=110000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_LXLCB'; '' //'下载'

column.name: WDYBDXX
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_NULLSUB(SJLY,'0')!=1

column.name: SFWCLYCTJC
column.describe: 是否完成利益冲突核查

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LB.getClient().isStandard==false

column.name: ZXRZNSHRY
column.describe: 投资银行总部职能审批人员

constraint.SQL:
["tUser.OrgID in (
select id from jgcrm.Lborganization t
where 1=1
start with t.ORGCODE = 921 
connect by prior t.id = t.fid
) and tUser.Status = 1",[]]

["tUser.OrgID in (
select id from jgcrm.Lborganization t
where 1=1
start with t.ORGCODE = 921 
connect by prior t.id = t.fid
) and tUser.Status = 1",[]]

column.name: SHXT
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var i = ABS_LOADBEAN('com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.apexsoft.livebosbean.PageJumpToAms');
//var url=i.getLivebosPageUrl('admin','tIB_ZSHRW','tIB_ZSHRW_XJRW','');
var url=i.getCompleteUrl($Login.User.UserID,'/bss/ams/page/index.sdo#task')
 '<input type="button" onclick=\'window.open("'+url+'")\' value="审核系统" />'
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBSFYYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKZYSHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ !=1

column.name: SHYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ZKBSFYYJ !=1 || ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.name: ZKBDGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ !=1

column.name: DGYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ !=1

column.name: ZKBQTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ !=1

column.name: QTYJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0||ZKBSFYYJ !=1

column.name: ZKBSHYJHZ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1= ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam  where paramname='ams.system'");
var cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.lcIB_LXLCB_ZKBSHYJHZ  where lcIB_LXLCB_ID=?",[ID]);
(cnt1==0&&cnt2==0)||( cnt1==1 && ZKBSFYYJ==null)

column.name: SFCJYJ1
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select paramvalue from jgcrm.tsysparam where paramname='ams.system'") == 0

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> SFCJYJ1 != 1

column.option: 1|线上立项表决;2|线下立项表决

column.name: BJJZRQ

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LXFS!=2

column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LXFS!=2

column.name: CHRY
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LXFS!=2

column.name: HYLYWJ
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LXFS!=2

column.name: SCLXHYYJHZ
column.describe: 上传立项会议意见汇总
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> CJLXHYJHZ!=1

column.name: BJYJ_copy

column.name: LXBJTP
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> LXFS!=1

column.name: QTLXCL
column.invisible-expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from JGCRM.lbmember where orgid IN (13831,13833) and roleid=3 and userid = ?",[$Login.User])==0 && ZKZY!=$Login.User && ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT INSTR(';'||?||';',';'||?||';') FROM DUAL",[ZKFS,$Login.User])==0 &&ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_LCYJJLB where yjr = ? and jsr = ?",[ZKZY,$Login.User])==0 && 0 != $Login.User

restrictions.condition:
{"statement":"1 = 1 
and (
({0} is null and {1} is null) 
or 
({0} is not null and {1} is null and to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) >= {0})
or 
({0} is null and {1} is not null and to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd'))<= {1})
or 
({0} is not null and {1} is not null and to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd')) >= {0} and to_number(to_char(SQSJ,'yyyymmdd'))<= {1})
)","args":[{"expression":"parameter.SQSJ","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13},{"expression":"parameter.SQSJ2","scale":0,"length":0,"type":13}],"type":0}

command.describe: 上传全套立项流程底稿
